languages.text: "После обряда астропат обретает свое назначение. В различных Адептусах, на астропатических реле, на кораблях. Чаще всего это наше первое и последнее место службы".

traits.locale_text: "После обряда астропат обретает свое назначение. В различных Адептусах, на астропатических реле, на кораблях. Чаще всего это наше первое и последнее место службы, покуда это редкость... исключение из правил, когда один из нас переживает своё первое место службы".

languages.text: "After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."
languages.original_text: "После обряда астропат обретает свое назначение. В различных Адептусах, на астропатических реле, на кораблях. Чаще всего это наше первое и последнее место службы".

traits.locale_text: "After the ritual, an astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."
"After the ritual, an astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."
"After the ritual, an astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."
"After the ritual, an astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."
"After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."
"After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."

languages.text: «Tras el ritual, se asigna al Astrópata a su puesto. Puede ser en uno de los Adeptus, en una estación de transmisión Astropática o en una nave. Con frecuencia, nuestro primer lugar de servicio es también el último».
languages.original_text: "After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."

traits.locale_text: «Tras el ritual, se asigna al Astrópata a su puesto. Puede ser en uno de los Adeptus, en una estación de transmisión Astropática o en una nave. Con frecuencia, nuestro primer lugar de servicio es también el último».

languages.text: 「儀式が終われば、感応通信官は各々のポジションを割り当てられる。帝国のあちこちや感応通信官の中継地、宇宙船なんかだな。だいたいの場合、最初の配属先が最後の配属先になる」
languages.original_text: "After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."

traits.locale_text: 「儀式が終われば、感応通信官は各々のポジションを割り当てられる。帝国のあちこちや感応通信官の中継地、宇宙船なんかだな。だいたいの場合、最初の配属先が最後の配属先になる」

languages.text: “仪式结束之后，所有星语者都会被分配到各自的岗位上，通常都是星语中继站或船上。通常情况下，我们一旦分配了岗位，便会至死都在那个岗位上工作。”
languages.original_text: "After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."

traits.locale_text: “仪式结束之后，所有星语者都会被分配到各自的岗位上，通常都是星语中继站或船上。通常情况下，我们一旦分配了岗位，便会至死都在那个岗位上工作。”

languages.text: "Nach dem Ritual wird ein Astropath seiner Position zugewiesen. Bei diesem oder jenem Adeptus, einem astropathischen Relais oder auf einem Schiff. Meistens ist unser erster Posten auch unser letzter."
languages.original_text: "After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."

traits.locale_text: "Nach dem Ritual wird ein Astropath seiner Position zugewiesen. Bei diesem oder jenem Adeptus, einem astropathischen Relais oder auf einem Schiff. Meistens ist unser erster Posten auch unser letzter."

languages.text: « Le rituel achevé, l'astropathe est affecté à son poste au sein de tel ou tel Adeptus, relais astropathique ou vaisseau. La plupart du temps, notre première affectation est aussi la dernière. »
languages.original_text: "After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."

traits.locale_text: « Le rituel achevé, l'astropathe est affecté à son poste au sein de tel ou tel Adeptus, relais astropathique ou vaisseau. La plupart du temps, notre première affectation est aussi la dernière. »

languages.text: "Astropatlar, ayinin ardından konumlarına atanır. Şu ya da bu Adeptus'ta, bir Astropatik Röle'de ya da bir gemide görev başına gelirler. Çoğu kez hizmete başladığımız yerde hizmetimiz son bulur."
languages.original_text: "After the ritual, an Astropath is assigned their position. At this or that Adeptus, an Astropathic relay, or a ship. More often than not, our first place of service is also our last."
